title: Mouse Trap
description:
A trap used to catch a mouse, rat, or other unwanted rodent. Metaphorically used in emoji form to suggest any kind of trap or entrapment.

The style of trap shown on major platforms has a box held high with a single stick. A wedge of cheese is used to lure a mouse into the box, knocking the stick away and trapping — but not killing — the mouse.

This is distinct from other traps which kill or injure upon capture.
apple_vendor_description: Rendered with precise detail on Apple devices, the mouse-trap emoji presents a classic wooden snap trap with a polished, slightly aged finish. Its metallic spring mechanism and bait tray are sharply defined, showcasing Apple's commitment to realistic textures and lighting effects. On Apple devices, this emoji can humorously suggest a trap, a difficult situation, or even a clever solution to a problem, often used with a touch of wit.
